(This message is just an announcement and therefore worksafe)

"Illusion of=
 Love" is a short story which is a reincarnation of a 
Peacemaker Kurogane =
fanfic I did years and years ago.  Now, the story 
features an original ver=
sion of the Shinsengumi in a yaoi work and 
also some genre-bending element=
s.  I believe yaoi, like any genre can 
be a vehicle for other themes which=
 can add diversity to the field.  
Illusion of Love does have very minimal =
man x man and also a thread of 
spirituality which will hopefully make the =
work very unique to readers.

The story is hosted at http://www.samurai-on-=
samurai.com
Please complete the (free) registration.  
You must be 18 years=
 old to join.

you can't 
miss this section of the website because it has male lower torso=
s 
covered in just fundoshi (^_^)
